```{r setup}
SciViews::R
```

```{r importation}
Zooplankton <- read("zooplankton", package = "data.io", lang = "AN")
```

The following graphic is about a zooplankton 

```{r graphique}
chart(data = Zooplankton, ~ size %fill=% class ) +
  geom_bar(width = 1) + 
  coord_polar("y", start = 0) +
  theme_void() +
  scale_fill_viridis_d()
```
